t = int(raw_input())
while t:
	t -= 1
	n = int(raw_input())
	arr = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split(" ")]
	dep = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split(" ")]
	maxcurr = 0
	for i in range(n):
		x = arr[i]
		curr = 1
		for j in range(n):
			if i == j:
				continue
			if dep[j] > arr[i] and arr[j] <= arr[i]:
				curr += 1
		if maxcurr < curr:
			maxcurr = curr
	print maxcurr
